mapper.insert: insert all into board values (seq_bo_no.nextval,2,#{courseTitle},null,#{courseWriter},0,null,default,sysdate) into course values (seq_co_no.nextval,seq_bo_no.currval,#{theme},#{schedule},#{courseDay},#{courseName},#{courseX},#{courseY},#{distance}) into img_file values (seq_file_no.nextval,seq_bo_no.currval,#{originName},#{changeName},1,null,default) select * from dual
